Instance.description: A Situation to manage walking dogs along paths in the world. The goal of this situation is to give autonomy to dogs and walkers and push them along a path in the world and allow them to do things at places of interest.

TunableTuple.name: attractor_point_tags
TunableTuple.description: Tags that are used to select objects and attractor points for our path.

TunableEnum.description: Tags to use if we don't find any objects with the search tags. This is primarily so we can have a separate list for pre- patched worlds where there are no hand-placed attractor points.

TunableList.name: search_tags
TunableList.description:
A list of path tags to look for in order. This will search for objects with each tag, find the closest object, and use it's matching tag to find others for a full path.
Example: Short_1, Short_2 are in the list. We would search for all objects with either of those tags, and grab the closest one. If the object has Short_1 tag on it, we find all objects with Short_1 to create our path.

TunableEnum.description: A set of attractor point tags we use to pull objects from when searching for attractor points to create a walking path from.

TunableTuple.name: dog_job_and_role_state
TunableTuple.description: Job and Role State for the dog being walked. Pre-populated as the target of the Situation.

Tunable.name: role_state
Tunable.description: A role state the sim assigned to the job will perform

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that can be performed at this Situation.

TunableTuple.name: finish_walk_state
TunableTuple.description: The state to walk back home.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

Tunable.name: go_home_affordance
Tunable.description: The affordance that the dog walker runs to go home.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: wait_around_state
TunableTuple.description: The state for the walker and dog to hang out so they can run interactions and act lively.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: wait_stat_and_value
TunableTuple.description: The stat and initial value on the dog that decides when we should walk to the next node in the situation. The timer for this state is a fallback if the Sim and dog end up taking too long.

Tunable.name: initial_value
Tunable.description: The initial value we should set on the Dog to decide when they should walk again.

Tunable.name: stat
Tunable.description:
The stat we track on the Dog, to notify us when the Sim should attempt to walk to the next attractor point.
When the stat reaches its convergence value, we enter the walk state.

TunableTuple.name: walk_nodes
TunableTuple.description: How many nodes in the world we want to traverse for our walk. Currently this will only affect fallback attractor points. We will try to use ALL of the attractor points returned by search tags.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableTuple.name: walk_state
TunableTuple.description: The state for the walker to take the dog to the next attractor node.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

Tunable.name: attractor_node_affordance
Tunable.description: The affordance that the dog walker runs on the next attractor point object.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

Tunable.name: max_attempts
Tunable.description: The maximum number of attempts we will try to walk to a node before walking to the next node.

Tunable.name: time_between_attempts
Tunable.description: The time in sim minutes between attempts to walk to the current attractor point.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: walker_job_and_role_state
TunableTuple.description: Job and Role State for the Sim walking the dog. Pre-populated as the actor of the Situation.

Tunable.name: role_state
Tunable.description: A role state the sim assigned to the job will perform

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that can be performed at this Situation.
